official_title: To adjust the boundaries of Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina.
short_title: Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2007

summary.text: Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2007 - Modifies the boundaries of the Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina, to provide for the inclusion of certain private land and Forest Service land in the Forest. Requires an owner's consent to acquire the private land.

titles.title: Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2007
To adjust the boundaries of Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina.
